    • Method Detail

      • allowedAuthorities

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allowedAuthorities(Permission permission)
        Look up the allowed authorities for a given permission. Authorities are String constants that appear in AuthoritiesConstants.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to look up.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable view of the set of allowed authorities.

      • getPermissionMatrix

        public static java.util.Map<Permission,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getPermissionMatrix()
        Get the permission matrix.

        The permission matrix maps each Permission to a set of authorities that have that permission.

        Returns:
        An unmodifiable view of the permission matrix.
